message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $10,000, which reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However,  $6,500 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $7,500. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
